text:
<link="https://www.startrekfleetcommand.com/orion-syndicate/"><color=#32dcff>View More Information About Syndicate</color></link>
1. Claim daily chest's to get XP and level up. Or attain packs in store to get more XP.
2. Buffs will be active after you collect the new level.
3. Shards and slots will be available after you collect the new level.
<color=#ffc926>Claim Syndicate XP Daily</color> and get more from the Store to <color=#ffc926>Level Up</color>!
<color=#ffc926>Earn Syndicate Officer Shards</color> and Level Up to <color=#ffc926>Unlock</color> powerful <color=#ffc926>Passive Bonuses</color>.
